derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from mis- 'awry' + alliance, on the pattern of French mésalliance

means.word_mean: 1. an unsuitable alliance (especially with regard to marriage)

auth_sentence.content: To be clear, that potential misalliance is by no means unique to Margaret Thatcher, nor indeed to the Conservative Party.
